name: Usability Heuristics Evaluation Template
description:
Evaluate your designs using Nielsen's usability heuristics.


Adapted from Jakob Neilsen's work, this template includes the following:

  • introductory slides, 
  • evaluation slides that you can replace with your content easily using pre-built components, 
  • and a default appendix with general tips for improving usability.


To make this template your own, edit the color styles, replace logo components and replace placeholder evaluation screens with your own.


Don't forget to read the "How to use this file?" page for more details.
